text: Cezary Zamana (born 14 November 1967 in Augustów, Poland) is a former professional road racing cyclist from Ełk, Poland. ==Major results== ;1992 :Stage win in West Virginia Mountain Classic :1st, overall, Cascade Cycling Classic ;1993 :Stage win in Dauphiné Libéré ;1996 :Stage win in Tour de Normandie ;1997 :3rd place overall and a stage win in Tour de Normandie ;1998 :1st in the Commonwealth Bank Classic :1st in the Kaczyna and Malinowski Memorial Race :3rd in the Polish Championship ;1999 :Polish road race champion :1st in the Łasak Memorial Race :2 stage wins in the Vuelta a Argentina ;2000 :9th Overall Tour de Pologne ;2001 :4th in the Polish Championship ;2002 :1st in the Łasak Memorial Race :2nd in the GP Midtbank :3rd in the 4 Fiat Aces Race + a stage win :6th in the Tour de Pologne + a stage win :International Course 4 Asy Fiata Autopoland stage 4 win ;2003 :1st in the Tour de Pologne + a stage win :1st in the Łasak Memorial Race :1st in the Tour of Małopolska + stage 1 and 2 win :2nd in the Tour de Slovaquie + a stage win ;2004 :3rd in the GP Isbergues :9th in the Tour de Pologne ;2005 :1st in the 3rd May Race in Lublin :1st in the Tour of Małopolska :1st in the Hessen Rundfahrt :2nd in the Bałtyk–Karkonosze Tour :4th in the Druivenkoers Overijse :7th in the Rund um den Henninger Turm ==External links== * * Category:1967 births Category:Living people Category:People from Augustów Category:Polish male cyclists Category:Sportspeople from Podlaskie Voivodeship Category:Tour de France cyclists
title: Cezary Zamana
